name: Guild Wars 2 - UM Launcher
short_description:
!! Please do note, that if you use these types of launchers, make sure that you don't use it on public or unsecured computers. !!

UPDATE - 17/05/2015:

Here we go, the brand-spanking-new GW2 UM Launcher.

With the newest (GW2Launcher_Update_2.zip) version, there is now a counter added that will minimize the launcher once Guild Wars 2 is fully logged in and ready to play.

This is because when using this launcher on days when there are updates, it doesn't let you know, and GW2 downloads the update in the background, so it seems that nothing is happening.

This is done by tracking when GW2 comes to the foreground, as it downloads updates as a background process.

** A new addition of code checks if GW2.exe has started, and will let you know once you launched your game.

** -nopatchui is no longer hard coded into the launcher. Giving you 100% control of how to launch your game.

Minor UI changes, button colours, position, transparency colours.
summary: Multiple user account launcher for Guild Wars 2
